text: Guillaume de Farges was a 14th-century French priest:University of Leicester a nephew of Pope Clement V, he was Archdeacon of Leicester from 1310 until his death in 1346. == Notes == ==Also see== * Diocese of Lincoln * Diocese of Peterborough * Diocese of Leicester * Archdeacon of Leicester Category:Archdeacons of Leicester Category:13th-century French people Category:Lincoln Cathedral Category:1346 deaths
title: Guillaume de Farges
